page.title: 13MORE SPORT IN BOURNEMOUTH
page.content: BOURNEMOUTH HAS A HISTORY OF INVOLVEMENT IN MANY KINDS OF SPORT INCLUDING SAILING, POWERBOAT RACING AND MORE RECENTLY WIND-SURFING. THE NEW BIC (BOURNEMOUTH INTERNATIONAL CENTRE) HAS ATTRACTED TOP CLASS SNOOKER, BADMINTON AND TABLE TENNIS SINCE IT OPENED IN 1984. WEST HANTS LAWN TENNIS CLUB HAS BEEN THE VENUE FOR INTERNATIONAL COMPETITIONS. BOURNEMOUTH HAS EXCELLENT GOLF COURSES LIKE QUEENS PARK AND MEYRICK PARK. BOURNEMOUTH CAN ALSO BOAST BECAUSE WE HAD ONE OF THE GREATEST HEAVYWEIGHT BOXERS. HIS NAME WAS FREDDY MILLS BUT UNFORTUNATELY HE DIED IN SUSPICIOUS CIRCUMSTANCES. ICE SKATING HAS PRODUCED A WORLD CHAMPION FROM BOURNEMOUTH CALLED COURTNEY JONES.
